sourcesContent:
const Data = [
    {
        id:1,
        heading:"Enjoy on your TV.",
        context:"Watch on smart TVs, PlayStation, Xbox, Chromecast, Apple TV, Blu-ray players and more.",
        imgsrc:"/images/tv.png",
        col:"col-lg-6",
        order1st:"order-2",
        order2nd:"order-1",
        videosrc:"https://assets.nflxext.com/ffe/siteui/acquisition/ourStory/fuji/desktop/video-tv-in-0819.m4v"
    },
    {
        id:2,
        heading:"Download your shows to watch offline.",
        context:"Save your favourites easily and always have something to watch.",
        imgsrc:"https://assets.nflxext.com/ffe/siteui/acquisition/ourStory/fuji/desktop/mobile-0819.jpg",
        col:"col-lg-6",
        videosrc:"https://assets.nflxext.com/ffe/siteui/acquisition/ourStory/fuji/desktop/video-tv-in-0819.m4v"
    },
    {
        id:3,
        heading:"Watch everywhere.",
        context:"Stream unlimited movies and TV shows on your phone, tablet, laptop, and TV.",
        imgsrc:"https://assets.nflxext.com/ffe/siteui/acquisition/ourStory/fuji/desktop/device-pile-in.png",
        col:"col-lg-6",
        videosrc:"https://assets.nflxext.com/ffe/siteui/acquisition/ourStory/fuji/desktop/video-devices-in.m4v"
    },
    {
        id:4,
        heading:"Create profiles for children.",
        context:"Send children on adventures with their favourite characters in a space made just for them—free with your membership.",
        col:"col-lg-6",
        imgsrc:"https://occ-0-1947-2164.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/19OhWN2dO19C9txTON9tvTFtefw/AAAABVxdX2WnFSp49eXb1do0euaj-F8upNImjofE77XStKhf5kUHG94DPlTiGYqPeYNtiox-82NWEK0Ls3CnLe3WWClGdiJP.png?r=5cf",
    }
]

export default Data;
